00001 #include "phold.h"
00002 
00003 void
00004 phold_init(phold_state * s, tw_lp * lp)
00005 {
00006         int              i;
00007 
00008         if(!lp->rng)
00009         {
00010                 lp->rng = tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "LP RNG", sizeof(tw_generator), 1);
00011                 tw_rand_initial_seed(lp->rng, lp->gid);
00012         }
00013 
00014         for (i = 0; i < g_phold_start_events; i++)
00015         {
00016                 tw_event_send(
00017                         tw_event_new(lp->gid, 
00018                                      tw_rand_exponential(lp->rng, mean), 
00019                                      lp));
00020         }
00021 }
00022 
00023 void
00024 phold_event_handler(phold_state * s, tw_bf * bf, phold_message * m, tw_lp * lp)
00025 {
00026         tw_lpid  dest;
00027 
00028         if(tw_rand_unif(lp->rng) <= percent_remote)
00029         {
00030                 bf->c1 = 1;
00031                 dest = tw_rand_integer(lp->rng, 0, ttl_lps - 1);
00032 
00033                 dest += offset_lpid;
00034 
00035                 if(dest >= ttl_lps)
00036                         dest -= ttl_lps;
00037         } else
00038         {
00039                 bf->c1 = 0;
00040                 dest = lp->gid;
00041         }
00042 
00043         tw_event_send(tw_event_new(dest, tw_rand_exponential(lp->rng, mean), lp));
00044 }
00045 
00046 void
00047 phold_event_handler_rc(phold_state * s, tw_bf * bf, phold_message * m, tw_lp * lp)
00048 {
00049         tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->rng);
00050         tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->rng);
00051 
00052         if(bf->c1 == 1)
00053                 tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->rng);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void
00057 phold_finish(phold_state * s, tw_lp * lp)
00058 {
00059 }
00060 
00061 const tw_optdef app_opt[] =
00062 {
00063         TWOPT_GROUP("PHOLD Model"),
00064         TWOPT_STIME("remote", percent_remote, "desired remote event rate"),
00065         TWOPT_UINT("nlp", nlp, "number of LPs per processor"),
00066         TWOPT_STIME("mean", mean, "exponential distribution mean for timestamps"),
00067         TWOPT_STIME("mult", mult, "multiplier for event memory allocation"),
00068         TWOPT_UINT("start-events", g_phold_start_events, "number of initial messages per LP"),
00069         TWOPT_UINT("memory", optimistic_memory, "additional memory buffers"),
00070         TWOPT_CHAR("run", run_id, "user supplied run name"),
00071         TWOPT_END()
00072 };
00073 
00074 int
00075 phold_main(int argc, char **argv, char **env)
00076 {
00077         int              i;
00078 
00079         tw_opt_add(app_opt);
00080 
00081         offset_lpid = g_tw_mynode * g_tw_nlp;
00082         ttl_lps = tw_nnodes() * g_tw_npe * g_tw_nlp;
00083 
00084         return 0;
00085 }
